title: Poster Design/Typesetting
content:
Hi folks. First time poster, long time lurker on Typophile.

I'm looking to get some feedback and/or ideas about a poster I'm designing for an event called "Four to the Floor." I was fooling around with more normal poster designs when I noticed the curious reflectivity of a lowercase "ft" onto a lowercase "tf". I've tried to play that out, though I don't totally like how the white text fits in. Any suggestions would be appreciated!

Thanks.

comments.content: The idea is good and solid, but you're right, the white font isn't quite right. Try a bunch of sans-serif faces until you find something that looks/feels right.
